code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import rootReducer from'../reducers';import reduxImmutableStateInvariant from'redux-immutable-state-invariant';import thunk from'redux-thunk';export default function configureStore(initialState){return createStore(rootReducer,initialState,applyMiddleware(thunk,reduxImmutableStateInvariant()));}
